column3: ACK 3b4dd2a6768536be3a7db21353f43ba614c17377\n\nNice to see this added. I've been monitoring the seed for a while so let me add some additional data about the seed: it returns about 50% reachable nodes and (from my vantage point) has ~100ms latency. The stale rate is a bit high-ish, but that might be easy to fix.

Thanks! Didn't know anyone else was monitoring it.\n\nI reset the database on it a week ago or so when I upgrading the seeder to @sipa's latest bitcoin-seeder code, so possibly that's why the stale rate is a bit high; maybe needs time to collect more data? Specifically it's running commit https://github.com/sipa/bitcoin-seeder/commit/d54f39a1eeb7ddb0638396755d3a76abbd4c41ef, with one small patch
Yeah, I added it some time ago to http://bitcoinstats.com/network/dns-servers/ :wink:
Concept ACK.\n\nI suppose you sign off on the [dnsseed policy](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/dnsseed-policy.md)?
Tested ACK.\nIPv4 and IPv6 works. Tried a couple of IPs retrived over the seeder. Crawler seems to be up to date.
